dot.description: Whether to display a small red dot in the upper right corner
dot.description_zh: 是否显示右上角小红点

badge.description: The contents of the logo in the upper right corner of the icon
badge.description_zh: 图标右上角徽标的内容

badge-props.description: Customize the properties of the logo, and the incoming object will be transparently passed to [Badge component's props](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/badge#props)
badge-props.description_zh: 自定义徽标的属性，传入的对象会被透传给 [Badge 组件的 props](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/badge#props)

url.description: The link address that you will be directed to after clicking
url.description_zh: 点击后跳转的链接地址

to.description: Click to jump to the destination route object, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to) of the Vue Router.
to.description_zh: 点击后跳转的目标路由对象，等同于 Vue Router 的 [to 属性](https://router.vuejs.org/zh/api/interfaces/RouterLinkProps.html#Properties-to)

replace.description: Whether to replace the current page history when redirecting
replace.description_zh: 是否在跳转时替换当前页面历史
